basic_safi_0.npcText: Help! Is anyone out there?! This tree branch fell in front of me and I can’t get through!

playerOptions.option: I hear you! I'm Duc! Are you hurt?!
My name is Duc! I’ll get you out of there!

basic_safi_0.1.npcText: Hi Duc! My name is Safi. I’m not injured, but I fell off of my bike and a tree branch fell in front of me when the shaking started.

playerOptions.option: Okay. I’ll hold the tree up for a moment, that should be long enough for you to crawl out.

basic_safi_0.2.npcText: *sigh* Thank you so much, Duc! My name is Safi. I was worried that I would be stuck there forever! I fell off of my bike and a tree branch fell in front of me when the shaking started. I need to get home.

playerOptions.option: Why do you need to get home?
I have some things in my backpack. Do you have anything to trade?
Well good luck. I have to go for now.

playerOptions.option: I have a wrench right here! Point out your house and I can turn off the gas.
